title: Weds Post Show (4-7-21)
itunes:title: Weds Post Show (4-7-21)
description:
Bobby on Ryan Reynolds not wanting to work Scarlett Johannsson because they were once married. We also discuss whether or not Bobby would like The Falcon and the Winter Soldier on Disney+. Bobby plays a clip of @trevmusicxpert who did a cover that Bobby posted on Instagram. Bobby also announced “The Biztape” which is a new podcast on the Nashville Podcast Network. And a new intro from K9_Florida.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
